summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 57th Avenue South, from Orcas Street to a point 290 feet, more or less (measured along 57th Avenue South), north of Dawson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12796 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
